name: state_number
description: This data element identifies the state in which the crash occurred. The codes are from the General Services Administration’s (GSA) publication of worldwide Geographic Location Codes (GLC). For more info on the codes, please look at <C1/V1/D1/PC1/P1/NM1 State Number> section in the pdf: https://crashstats.nhtsa.dot.gov/Api/Public/ViewPublication/812315

name: state_name
description: This data element identifies the state in which the crash occurred. The codes are from the General Services Administration’s (GSA) publication of worldwide Geographic Location Codes (GLC).

name: consecutive_number
description: This data element is the unique case number assigned to each crash. It appears on each data file and is used to merge information from the data files together. xxxxxx Two Characters for State Code followed by Four Characters for Case Number

name: vehicle_number
description: This data element is the consecutive number assigned to each vehicle in the case. This data element appears on each vehicle level data file and is used in conjunction with the ST_CASE data element to merge information from vehicle level data files. 000-999 Assigned Number of Motor Vehicle

name: vehicle_make
description: Contains the Polk standardized abbreviation for the OEM's vehicle make. The vehicle make generally contains what the general public usually considers to be a vehicle brand name, for example, Chrysler, Dodge, Ford, Mercury, Toyota, GMC, Chevy, etc.

name: marketing_year
description: The marketing year defined by the OEM within which the vehicle was produced. The value contained in this attribute may not always match the calendar year in which the vehicle was actually manufactured. Many OEMs release models prior to calendar year.

name: vehicle_type_code
description: A Polk assigned code that defines the type of a vehicle represented by a specific VIN. For example: M,P,C or T.

name: vehicle_type
description: The description of the Polk assigned code for the vehicle type code. For example: passenger, truck, motorcycle, commercial trailer.

name: make_name
description: (Make- Name) Full name of the make (i.e. Chevrolet)

name: model_code
description: (Model Code) description

name: vehicle_trim
description: The Trim of the vehicle

name: vehicle_trim_1
description: The trim of the vehicle. This field is used when a VIN Pattern could have more than 1 trim assigned.

name: vehicle_trim_2
description: The trim of the vehicle. This field is used when a VIN Pattern could have more than 2 trims assigned.

name: vehicle_trim_3
description: The trim of the vehicle. This field is used when a VIN Pattern could have more than 3 trims assigned.

name: vehicle_trim_4
description: The trim of the vehicle. This field is used when a VIN Pattern could have more than 4 trims assigned.

name: body_style_code
description: A Polk assigned code that describes the body style of the vehicle. For example, CP=Coupe.

name: body_style
description: The description of the Polk assigned code Body Style Code For example: Coupe

name: num_of_doors
description: The number of doors the vehicle has

name: number_of_wheels
description: The number of wheel ends on the vehicle. For example in a 6x4 configuration this would be the 6.

name: num_of_wheels_by_power_train
description: Number of wheels driven by the power train. For example in a 6x4 configuration this would be the 4.

name: vehicle_manufacturer_code
description: (Vehicle Manufacturer Name) Standard abbreviation of the name of the vehicle manufacturer, i.e. General Motors, as defined by the National Crime Information Center

name: vehicle_manufacturer_name
description: (Vehicle Manufacturer Name) The name of the vehicle manufacturer, i.e. General Motors, as defined by the National Crime Information Center

name: displacement_cid
description: (Displacement CID) displacement in cubic inches. This is a rounded, marketing value, like 302 cubic inches, instead of 4967 cc.

name: displacement_cc
description: (Displacement CC) displacement in cubic centimeters. We intend to use this as the definitive, exact displacement value, i.e. 4967 cc.

name: cylinder_count_code
description: Contains a code that represents the number of cylinders a vehicle's combustion engine can have.

name: cycle_count
description: (Cycle Count) Refers to the cycle or stroke of an engine. 2-strokes are lightweight and simpler, but they burn oil, by design. Few cars on the road in North America are two-strokes, the last one offered was a 1967 Saab.

name: fuel_code
description: (Fuel) What an internal combustion burns to move a piston in a cylinder

name: fuel
description: (Fuel) description

name: type_of_fuel_code
description: The type of fuel injection

name: type_of_fuel
description: The type of fuel injection used by a vehicle. For example, Direct, Throttle body

name: carburetion_types_code
description: Carburetion types include 'Carburetor', 'Fuel Injection', N/A

name: carburetion_types
description: The description of the Polk assigned code which identifies the vehicle carburetion type. For example Carburetor, Fuel Injection, Unknown or Electric.

name: num_of_barrels
description: The number of barrels on a carbureted engine.

name: gross_vehicle_weights_range_code
description: Contains a code that identifies the Polk standard groupings of gross vehicle weights to which a vehicle may belong. This information is typically captured only for trucks.

name: gross_vehicle_weights_range
description: The description for the manufacturers assigned Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW) for trucks. This rating may or may not equal the actual GVW.

name: distance_between_axles_for_base_model
description: Contains the distance between the front and rear axles of a vehicle in inches of the base model of the vehicle.

name: distance_between_axles_for_particular_series
description: Contains the longest distance between the front and rear axles of a vehicle in inches for a particular series of that vehicle.

name: front_tire
description: (Front Tire) More specific tire description (ex. Michelin Eagle P245/40ZR)

name: front_tire_pressure
description: (Front Tire Pressure) Vehicle Mfr. recommendation for tire pressure, in pounds/sq. in.

name: front_tire_size_code
description: Describes the size of the front tire. For example '17R245'

name: front_tire_size
description: (Front Tire Size Description) As in '17R245'

name: rear_tire
description: (Rear Tire) More specific tire description (ex. Michelin Eagle P245/40ZR)

name: rear_tire_pressure
description: (Rear Tire Pressure) Vehicle Mfr. recommendation for tire pressure, in pounds/sq. in.

name: rear_tire_size_code
description: The size of the rear tires. example '17R245'

name: rear_tire_size
description: (Rear Tire Size Description) As in '17R245'

name: tonnage_rating
description: (Tonnage Rating) description

name: shipping_weight
description: Contains the base weight of the vehicle, rounded to the nearest one hundred pounds, as defined in the OEM's specifications. The base weight of a vehicle is the empty weight of the base model of the vehicle (i.e., the stripped down version of the vehicle)

name: base_price
description: Contains the base price of the vehicle as designated by the OEM's specifications. BASE PRICE includes only the price for the base model of the vehicle, excluding any optional equipment that may have been added as a result of the vehicle's TRIM LEVEL.

name: drive_type_1
description: (Drive Type) This element describes type of driving configuration for cars and trucks such as FWD, AWD, RWD.

name: drive_type_2
description: (Drive Type) description

name: country_sold_code
description: (Country Sold / Specific Market) Country where the vehicle is planned to be sold (may have different emissions standards).

name: country_sold
description: (Country Sold / Specific Market) description

name: brakes_abs_code
description: (Brakes- ABS Code) A code that describes whether a vehicle has or does not have anti-lock brakes, and what kind of brakes they are. (Not coded for heavy truck). This is based on the series code that is assigned the vehicle from VINA.

name: brakes_abs_description
description: (Brakes- ABS Code) description

name: security_type_code
description: (Security Type) Describes the security system (if any) installed on this model.

name: security_type
description: (Security Type) description

name: daytime_running_lights_1
description: (Daytime Running Lights)A Polk assigned code that identifies whether or not the vehicle has daytime running lights.

name: daytime_running_lights_2
description: (Daytime Running Lights) description

name: restraint_type_code
description: (Restraint Type) A Polk assigned code that identifies the type of restraints that a vehicle has based on VIN.

name: restraint_type
description: (Restraint Type) description

name: cab_configuration_code
description: (Cab Configuration) Cab Type describes the physical configuration of a truck's cabin.

name: cab_configuration
description: (Cab Configuration) medium description

name: axle_type_front_axle_code
description: (Axle- Type, Front Axle) The location of the front axle of a truck tractor. Set forward increases stability on the highway, Setback increases maneuverability in tight spaces.

name: axle_type_front_axle
description: (Axle- Type, Front Axle) short description

name: axle_type_rear_axle_code
description: (Axle- Type, Rear Axle) Represents rear axle configuration on a truck tractor. Tandem axles increase load bearing capability.

name: axle_type_rear_axle
description: (Axle- Type, Rear Axle) short description

name: brake_type_code
description: (Brake Type) The type of brakes on the Vehicle (currently commercial truck only). Truck VIN determines this currently

name: brake_type
description: (Brake Type) description

name: engine_manufacture_code
description: (Mfr.) A Polk assigned code given to the original equipment manufacture of the within a vehicle

name: engine_manufacture
description: (Mfr.) description

name: engine_model
description: (Model) description

name: duty_type_code
description: (Duty Type) A Polk assigned code that represents the duty type of a truck engine, based on manufacturer information.

name: duty_type
description: (Duty Type) medium description

name: bed_length_code
description: (Bed Length) Code representing the manufacturer's description of the relative size of the cargo area of a pickup truck or van. A 'long' Ford Ranger bed (compact pickup) may well be shorter than a 'short' bed on an F350 (large industrial pickup).

name: bed_length
description: (Bed Length) description

name: standard_segmentation_code
description: The Polk standard segmentation code

name: standard_segmentation
description: Description of SEGMENTATION_CODE that represents the Polk Standard Segmentation applied.

name: plant_code
description: (Plant Code) Plant code where vehicle was manufactured.

name: plant_country
description: (Country) This is the country where the plant is located. Example values are USA, Canada and Japan.

name: plant_city
description: (City) This is the city where the plant is located.

name: plant_country_code
description: A code representing the country the plant is in.

name: plant_state_code
description: A code representing the state or province the plant is in.

name: plant_state
description: (State or Province) This is the state or province (Canada) location of the plant.

name: origin_code
description: (Origin) A code that indicates the origin of a vehicle.

name: origin
description: (Origin) description

name: displacement_liters
description: (Displacement Liters) displacement in rounded Liters, where 1,000 cubic centimeters = 1 liter. Even domestic makes will advertise displacement in terms of liters (e.g. 5.0 liter mustang, which equates to a 302 CID or 4967 cc displacement).

name: block_type
description: (Block Type) Description

name: head_configuration_1
description: (Head Configuration) Describes the cylinder head's camshaft/valve configuration.

name: head_configuration_2
description: (Head Configuration) description

name: valves_per_cylinder
description: (Valves Per Cylinder) Number of intake/exhaust valves per cylinder.

name: valves_total
description: (Valves Total) Total number of intake/exhaust valves.

name: engine_code
description: (Code) Code derived from the VIN (not the secondary VIN for a motorcycle). Usually a single character, some manufactures give full positions 4-8 and engine information from that; they do not break it down any further.

name: is_incomplete
description: Indicator that signifies whether the vehicle is consider 'incomplete' (Y/N)

name: battery_type_code
description: A value that identifies the kind of battery in the vehicle. For example: PbA- Lead Acid, NMH- Nickel Metal Hydride.

name: battery_type
description: The description of the Polk assigned code for the Battery Type Code. For example: PbA- Lead Acid, NMH- Nickel Metal Hydride.

name: total_battery_power
description: The measure of total battery power expressed in kilowatts. For example: 71KW, 85KW, 75KW, 67KW.

name: battery_voltage
description: The voltage rating of the battery as provided by the manufacturer.

name: supercharge_flag
description: Indicates if the engine has a supercharger or not.

name: supercharge_flag_description
description: Indicates if the engine has a supercharger or not. Yes, No or Unknown.

name: turbocharger_flag
description: Indicates if the engine has a turbocharger

name: turbocharger_flag_description
description: Indicates if the engine has a turbocharger. Yes, No or Unknown.

name: variable_valve_timing_flag
description: Used to determine if a car has Variable Valve Timing

name: motorcycles_body_style_code
description: A further breakdown of body style for motorcycles to indicate if is it On-Road or Off-Road.

name: motorcycles_body_style
description: A further breakdown of body style for motorcycles to indicate if is it On-Road or Off-Road.
